branchCategory.name: LVH
branchCategory.description: LVH series air operated high purity valves are corrosion resistant against acid, alkali and ultra pure water, making the LVH valve the perfect answer to overcome the harsh environments often encountered in wet process applications. Series LVH is a manually operated valve, available in a threaded or integral fitting type.
